name: Angkor: Celebrations
description:
Angkor: Celebrations is a family friendly Match-3 with engaging gameplay. The game also includes (skippable) minigames.

Every hundred years, the magicians and sages of Angkor celebrate the humble beginnings of the secret mage town.

A disciple with great potential is chosen and assigned a very important task: to locate the pieces and assemble the ceremonial kīla. Without the fully assembled kīla, the doors to the temple will not open and the celebrations cannot begin.

This year, the great honour of assembling the ceremonial kīla was bestowed upon you…

Enjoy the game the way you want: Play timed, move limited, or endless. Choose difficulty and graphics quality. Play the minigames, or skip them.

Features

✪ Pick up and play
✪ 101 levels of fun match making
✪ Fun mini games included
✪ Gameplay options can be changed anytime
✪ New types of runes and tiles
